reviews.text: Stopped in for dinner at the bar on a Wednesday. Restaurant was busy and lively but I got a seat at the bar. The bar was clean and the bar staff seemed to...
Martini felt more like a steakhouse than an Italian restaurant to me, but as the bartender told us they are trying to be "modern." No yummy Marcella's...
We had a great experience at Martini, and we started with the fresh mozerella and the bruschetta. The bruschetta was honestly the star of the show as it was...
